Also taken were pieces from the Amarnah period, including a sandstone head of a princess and a limestone statue of Akhenaten holding an offering table, Zahi Hawass said in an emailed statement. An investigation has begun, to search for the people who have taken these objects, and the police and army plan to follow up with the criminals already in custody, the statement said.
